original_text: Then the Lord opened Balaam’s eyes, and he saw the angel of the Lord standing in the road with his sword drawn. So he bowed low and fell facedown.
korean_text: 그 때에 여호와께서 발람의 눈을 밝히시매 여호와의 사자가 손에 칼을 빼들고 길에 선 것을 그가 보고 머리를 숙이고 엎드리니

sentences.original_text: Then the Lord opened Balaam's eyes
and he saw the angel of the Lord
standing in the road with his sword drawn
sentences.korean_translation: 길에 서서 칼을 뽑아 들고 있는 것을 보았다
